Package pw.ollie.politics.util.message

Class MessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pw.ollie.politics.util.message.MessageBuilder
  • public final class MessageBuilder
extends Object
    Builds FormattedMessage objects using a set ColourScheme.
